data.event: Randa is first mentioned in 1305 as Randa.

event.title: 1819, the village was almost totally destroyed

data.event: In 1819, the village was almost totally destroyed by the blast from a huge avalanche that fell nearby.

event.title: 1991, a portion of the village was flooded

data.event: In 1991, a portion of the village was flooded following a large rockslide from a cliff above the town.
